name: PirateDangeon
description:
This is a game about how a little pirate walks around the islands, fights with opponents, passes difficult obstacles and destroys the boss whom he wanted to destroy from the very beginning of the game. This is an action platformer and adventure together, have you seen it anywhere else, be sure to play my game.I forgot to warn you that this game will make you bomb!

Management:

Movement - A D or left arrow right arrow

Jump - SPACE or W or arrow up

Attack - LMB

Restart - R
